name: Examination of Fear
description:
Sooo..... I found this tape from an excavation site. Its supposed to be from an abandoned building from the 19s... maybe? So, the point is that... everything in the site was rotten and destroyed.... except this old tape. Which is very weird for numerous reasons. I have watched this tape from a device, which can read such formats, and I have recovered most of it and... it seems very.... distorted. - Robert J Remake of "Examination of Fear"
A Game that I made a few months back

Playing on ~60 Volume and Full screen  is recommended!!

[Audio might lack on certain browsers depending on internet speed and allocated memory]

Voices : Matthew_English (freetts.com)
Images : Reddit (reddit.com/r/creepy)
SFX : MixxIT (mixxit.co) 
Music : Pixabay (pixabay.com)
Game Engine : GDevelop 5 (gdevelop.io)
Tools : PixiJS, Pixlr X
Inspiration : Wenderly Games
